cells.data:
-- concat :: [[a]] -> [a]
-- concat :: [String] -> String
on concat(xs)
    if length of xs > 0 and class of (item 1 of xs) is string then
        set acc to ""
    else
        set acc to {}
    end if
    repeat with i from 1 to length of xs
        set acc to acc & item i of xs
    end repeat
    acc
end concat
